attributes.action: Allow ALL restrictions lifted for weddings before the 19th July 2021.
attributes.additional_details:
If the World Leaders can have a stand up evening drinks reception during the G7 summit, then so should all those having a wedding. 
The Government are allowing football fans to still watch/celebrate that, in their thousands, but you have to have table service at a wedding. 
A wedding is a celebration, a life event something which the Government need to remember.
attributes.background: Lift all restrictions for weddings, allowing dancing no mask wearing, no table service.
